li.a: NYS ESSA Funded Programs Complaint Procedures

div.class: vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-3d vc_cta3-shape-round vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-green vc_cta3-icon-size-md

p.strong: Evergreen Charter School takes a whole-child approach to elementary education. Teachers, administrators, counselors, and dedicated support staff work together to meet the intellectual, social, behavioral, and emotional needs of each and every child we serve.

div.class: vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-3d vc_cta3-shape-round vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-green vc_cta3-icon-size-md

p.strong: I promise to respect myself, respect others and respect our Earth’s resources.

div.class: vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-3d vc_cta3-shape-round vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-green vc_cta3-icon-size-md

p.strong: I pledge to protect the Earth, respect the web of life upon it, and to honor the dignity of every member of our global family. One planet, one people, one world, in harmony, with peace, freedom and justice for all.

div.class: vc_general vc_cta3 vc_cta3-style-outline vc_cta3-shape-rounded vc_cta3-align-center vc_cta3-color-sandy-brown vc_cta3-icon-size-md

strong.span: Governor Andrew M. Cuomo signed an executive order directing all schools in New York to close until May 15.

div.strong: El gobernador Andrew M. Cuomo firmó una orden ejecutiva que ordena que todas las escuelas de Nueva York cierren hasta el 15 de mayo.

h2.strong: Always connecting with our students and families

header.h4: We are excited to report that the Board of Regents approved Evergreen Charter School's expansion to a high school commencing with 9th grade this fall 2020.

div.p: Estamos muy felices de anunciarles que la Junta Directiva de Educación del Estado de Nueva York ha aprobado que Evergreen Charter School ofrezca una escuela secundaria empezando con el grado 9 este otoño 2020.

div.h2: Evergreen Charter School: The Impossible Dream

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_sep_color_green vc_separator-has-text

div.p: Evergreen is offering breakfast and lunch to go for all students from 7 to 10 am each day in the elementary school parking lot. If you need a form, additional forms will be at the school on Monday from 7 to 10 am. We need your form so we can prepare the meals for the day without waste. Thank you.

Tengan en cuenta que Evergreen está ofreciendo desayuno y almuerzo para todos los estudiantes de 7 a 10 am cada día en el estacionamiento de la escuela primaria. Necesitamos su formulario para que podamos preparar las comidas para cada día sin desperdicio. Gracias.
